reapack.name: bbs_Copy selected take names to clipboard.lua
reapack.desc: Copies the active take names of selected items to the clipboard.

reapack.name: bbs_Copy selected track names to clipboard.lua
reapack.desc: Copies the names of selected tracks to the clipboard.

reapack.name: bbs_Rename selected takes from clipboard.lua
reapack.desc: Renames selected takes using a multiline list from the clipboard.

reapack.name: bbs_Rename selected tracks from clipboard.lua
reapack.desc: Renames selected tracks using a multiline list from the clipboard.

reapack.name: bbs_Move selected items to new tracks by name.lua
reapack.desc: Moves each selected item to a new track named after the item's take.

reapack.name: bbs_Add take marker at selected items end.lua
reapack.desc: Adds a take marker at the end position of each selected item.

reapack.name: bbs_Add take marker at selected items start.lua
reapack.desc: Adds a take marker at the start position of each selected item.

reapack.name: bbs_Create region for items on each selected track.lua
reapack.desc: For each selected track, creates a region spanning all its items.

reapack.name: bbs_Generate Osu mania chart from items.lua
reapack.desc: Exports selected items as an osu!mania chart to the clipboard.
